column2:
"Have you been getting too excited recently? If so, are you just relapsing
to your old hack ways?"

"You need to always have a back-to-basics
mentality. I mean, cockiness will get you
killed, and that's no joke!"

"So I want you to try completing \"Tunnels
Mech\" on Hard difficulty as quickly as you can.
Just think of it as a chance for self-reflection."
